Create an app that uses augmented reality to teach users how to properly use an umbrella in different weather conditions.
Design a line of fashionable umbrellas with unique patterns and designs that make them stand out from the crowd.
Launch a campaign to encourage people to use umbrellas more often by creating catchy slogans and sharing tips on how to stay dry in rainy weather.
Develop a game where players must navigate through a rainstorm using their umbrella as a shield against falling objects.
Partner with local businesses to create customized umbrellas that feature the logos or branding of the business, making them a useful and eye-catching promotional tool.
